Package Model

Class Board

java.lang.Object
Model.Board
public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
Board is the class that contains the attributes and methods to implement the behavior of a board in the Thats Life! game.

Implements the methods to determine the type of spaces in the board, such as if the space is a magenta type of space for example.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static int MAX_SPACES
    The max number of spaces in the board.
    private java.util.ArrayList<Space> spaces
    The list (sequence) of spaces in the board.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Board()
    Creates the game board containing the list (sequence) of spaces.

    Determines if the current player is at the blue space of the board given the type of the space currently landed on.

    Determines if the current player is at either the career space or the family space junction of the board given the magenta action of the magenta space landed on by the current player.

    Determines if the current player is at the magenta space of the board given the type of the space currently landed on.

    Determines if the current player is at the buy house magenta space of the board given the action of the magenta space currently landed on.
    boolean isCareerChoiceSpace​(java.lang.String action)
    Determines if the current player is at the college career choice magenta space of the board given the action of the magenta space currently landed on.

  • Method Details

    • chosenPath

      public int chosenPath​(int spaceNum)
      Determines the path that the current player will move to based on its choice and its current space number in the board.
      Parameters:
      spaceNum - the space number of the current player on the board
      Returns:
      A space number indicating the starting space of the path that the current player will move to.

    • isAtStartJunction

      public boolean isAtStartJunction​(int num)
      Determines if the current player is at the start space junction of the board given its current space number.
      Parameters:
      num - the current space number of the current player on the board
      Returns:
      true if the current player is on the start space junction of the board; false otherwise.

    • isAtCareerJunction

      public boolean isAtCareerJunction​(int num)
      Determines if the current player is at the career space junction of the board given its current space number.
      Parameters:
      num - the current space number of the current player on the board
      Returns:
      true if the current player is on the career space junction of the board; false otherwise.

    • isAtFamilyJunction

      Returns:

    • isAtMagentaJunction

      public boolean isAtMagentaJunction​(java.lang.String action)
      Determines if the current player is at either the career space or the family space junction of the board given the magenta action of the magenta space landed on by the current player.
      Parameters:
      action - the action of the magenta space
      Returns:
      true if the current player is at one of the magenta space junctions; false otherwise.
